Returns: true if the genre is canonical, otherwise false.
Parameters: String: The name of genre to be checked.
isCanonical(java.lang.String).Description: Returns whether a given text is a canonical genre defined in @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres_E@.

Returns: an encoded genre string that can be inserted into the @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#COLUMN_BROADCAST_GENRE_E@ or @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#COLUMN_CANONICAL_GENRE_E@ column.
Parameters: String: Genre strings. This value must never be null. Value is @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#FAMILY_KIDS_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#SPORTS_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#SHOPPING_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#MOVIES_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#COMEDY_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#TRAVEL_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#DRAMA_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#EDUCATION_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#ANIMAL_WILDLIFE_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#NEWS_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#GAMING_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#ARTS_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#ENTERTAINMENT_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#LIFE_STYLE_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#MUSIC_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#PREMIER_E@, or @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#Genres#TECH_SCIENCE_E@
encode(java.lang.String...).Description: Encodes genre strings to a text that can be put into the database.

Parameters: String: The encoded genre string retrieved from the @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#COLUMN_BROADCAST_GENRE_E@ or @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Programs#COLUMN_CANONICAL_GENRE_E@ column. This value must never be null.
decode(java.lang.String).Description: Decodes the genre strings from the text stored in the database.
